dict.string: This app needs access to your location even when it's running in the background. We use your location data to enhance your experience by providing more relevant fishing location posts. Knowing your location allows us to show you fishing spots that are nearby and cater to your preferences based on your current location.

Your location allow you to improve your experience by offering more personalized content. When you post a fishing location or use the app, we want to ensure that the information you see is relevant to your current location. By knowing where you are, and nearby fishing opportunities.

Your location allows us to provide personalized content and improve your experience. We use your location to offer nearby fishing opportunities and relevant information based on your current location.
